Name: Forest Tower Defense
About the game: Wrrrrrrâ€¦.The evil spirits are approaching the town again. The locals can no longer feel safe like before. Welcome in this new tower defense game. Now is the time to become everyone's hero. Apply your leadership skills and create your own army of soldiers, magicians and archers and try to get the situation under control, before the orcs start invading the town. Safety and tranquility is now your main goal that you must take care of. Your mission is to protect your territories until the end! Don't think too much, because you have all the support of the people. Good will always overcome evil. We wish you as much courage and strength as possible to prove who is really the boss in these lands. Game Features : - Daily Reward with Coins - More than 10 levels - Free Mode - Upgrades available
